Still, despite all their incredible adventures, the Novas' greatest quest is ahead of them; they've just been invited to visit the Stardustian homeworld!

It's a mouth-watering journey, as 16 of the country's best young bakers compete. A joyful way of getting children passionate about food.

programme.desc: Xingtong asked Xingyi questions about her long hair and Zhao Tianming. Xinyi is worried that Xingtong may have regained her memory and told Haoren about it. It turns out that Xingyi is a mole brought in by Haoren to create an illusion of family support.

programme.title: Rhapsody In Blue - EP 13
programme.desc: 24 year-old Ding Yirou was about to marry 40 year-old pilot Guo Yongtao when he died from a hit-and-run accident, leaving behind his daughter, Guo Doudou. Having no one to turn to, the kind Yirou took in the 11 year-old Doudou, who lost her ability to speak after witnessing the accident. While seeking help for Doudou, Yirou met music therapist Lan Ziyuan.

However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Aku Sudah Tak Ayam Lagi
programme.desc: Mita (Yuriska Patricia) was sworn into poverty by Genta (Fendy Chow), a dim sum seller, not long after Mita received news that her father died and left a lot of debt. Mita fell into poverty and had to go to the village to meet her grandfather to learn to manage her father's inheritance, a chicken farm.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 342
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Bisa Bisanya Gue Naksir Mas Susu
programme.desc: Jesica changes after meeting Asep the milkman who ran her over.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 328
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 2

programme.title: BIDUAN GEROBAK DANGDUT TRENDING
programme.desc: Mira, a beautiful woman from Kampung Dangdut, works as a "ngangon goat" worker. Feeling talented in singing dangdut, Mira auditioned to sing dangdut in her village, even though the pungent smell of goats on her body was not a barrier to auditioning. However, her father did not approve, even though Mira had a very melodious voice. How would Mira continue her talent as a dangdut singer despite her goat odor? Will she continue to "ngangon kambing"?

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 342

programme.title: Kenalin Mas Serabutan Pengendali Hati
programme.desc: Cinta (Nabila Zavira) works odd jobs, being a traveling dangdut singer and various other jobs. In order to keep her friendship intact, Cinta pays her neighbor, Andre (Kenny Austin) the odd-job man, to pretend to be her boyfriend, so that her friend won't get angry and her friendship can return.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 328

programme.title: KOPI DANGDUT BIKIN HATI CENAT CENUT
programme.desc: Kevin (Masaji Wijayanto) is confused because the coffee cafe he inherited from his mother is getting quiet. It turns out that the traveling coffee made by Maya (Maudy Effrosina) in front of Kevin's cafe attracts the attention of many people. People who buy coffee made by Maya because of her selling style like a professional coffee bartender and it is said that it can make hearts swoon.

programme.title: Rekayasa Cinta Dokter Cantik No Play Play
programme.desc: Angel (Zoe Abbas), who is constantly pressured by her mother to get married, finally takes the practical route by claiming to be the lover of her patient who suffers from amnesia. Angel's two best friends don't agree with her idea, but they end up supporting her. Angel says she will soon marry the man whose real name is Marcel (Bryan McKenzie) because Angel claims to be Marcel's fiancée before Marcel has amnesia.

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: LAKSHMI

programme.title: Movie - Nagarvalam - EP 1
programme.desc: The driver of a Metro water lorry and a girl in the locality he supplies water to fall in love. But will the girl's family, which has powerful connections, agree to this match?

programme.title: Movie - Billa Pandi - EP 1
programme.desc: Billa Pandi, a dedicated Ajith fan and contractor, selflessly aids his community. His life complicates when Jayalakshmi falls for him, challenging his feelings for Valli.

programme.title: Movie - Thangaraja - EP 1
programme.desc: Manjula falls in love with Raja, but he's afraid to return her feelings. He later discovers that her father is the man who ruined his sister's life.

programme.title: Movie - Ko 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Kumaran, an ordinary citizen, abducts Tamil Nadu's chief minister, leaving the nation puzzled over what drove him to take such a drastic step.

programme.title: Movie - Kurup - EP 1
programme.desc: Driven by greed, Kurup weaves lies, fake deaths, and identity theft. His scheme takes a twist when a clever policeman starts pursuing him.

programme.title: Movie - Kuttrame Thandanai - EP 1
programme.desc: A visually impaired young man uses his sharp senses to solve a murder mystery and uncover the truth behind the crime.

programme.title: Movie - 2.0 - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Bhaskar Oru Rascal - EP 1
programme.desc: Two kids, each from a single-parent home, team up to bring their moms and dads together, hoping to create the happy, complete family they've always wanted.

programme.title: Movie - Deivamachan - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga - EP 1
programme.desc: Kesavan and Murugan, aspiring politicians, use unconventional methods, disregarding advice and losing love interests.

programme.title: Movie - Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu - EP 1
programme.desc: Aravind (Bharath) loses his girl friend Liyana (Mirthika) in a car accident and he lives with her memories. But, people around him try to make him believe that he is just hallucinating and no such person existed. The rest of the story shows whether he has been hallucinating about a non-existed girl friend or if there was really one.

programme.title: Movie - Yaagavarayinum Naa Kaaka - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Wolf - EP 1
programme.desc: Achyut and Anand are brothers, Jyosthna is a tenant in their home. Both the brothers try impressing her.

programme.title: Movie - Kirumi - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Khiladi Mrumagan - EP 1
programme.desc: Chaitu and Anu fall in love but their love is opposed by Anu's mother, Shailaja Reddy, a woman who is determined to get her daughter married to the man of her choice.

programme.title: Movie - Kho Kho - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Sathriyan
programme.desc: Guna, a local boy, falls in love with Niranjana, the daughter of Samuthiram, a deceased mafia leader. However, Niranjana's family does not approve of their relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Satham Podaathay
programme.desc: Bhanu tries to save her marriage although her husband Ratnavel is impotent. Their marriage ends anyway and Bhanu marries again. But a vengeful Ratnavel kidnaps her and holds her hostage in his house.

programme.title: Movie - Idhu Enga Boomi
programme.desc: Vijay lands in jail while avenging his sister's death. However, when he escapes prison and starts working at Nagalingam's home, he learns that he is planning to steal the villagers' money.

programme.title: Movie - Vani Mahal
programme.desc: Vani Mahal is a Tamil feature film starring Vignesh and Sulakshmi.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Manaivi Solle Manthiram
programme.desc: Selvi, who is married to Dr Thyagu, is shocked by the lavish nature of his family and warns him against overspending. Enraged by their actions, Selvi decides to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Movie - Yes Madam
programme.desc: Although Sivaram is against marriage, he ends up marrying Gayatri. When Sumati and her son move into the house opposite Sivaram's house, Gayatri is shocked to learn that she is Sivaram's first wife.

programme.title: Movie - Paayum Puli (Old)
programme.desc: After a man loses his sister at the hands of a deadly smuggler, he decidedly vows to avenge her death. He trains himself in martial arts and appears before the culprits using a new identity.

programme.title: Movie - Asathal
programme.desc: Vetri leads a carefree life with his two best friends. When an unknown woman dies leaving behind her baby, Vetri claims in court that he is the father to avoid marriage and puts himself in trouble.

programme.title: Movie - Sabari
programme.desc: Sabarivasan, a cardiologist, works in a government hospital during the day and runs a clinic at night. He attracts the enmity of a local goon when he gets the goon's partner arrested.

programme.title: Movie - Bhadra
programme.desc: An unknown disease kills many people in a village; however, according to a prediction, someone will come to help them. When one of the villagers meets Raju, he realises that Raju is the one who can save them.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Chootiya Malar
programme.desc: This movie stars Vijayakanth and Subhadra, and is directed by C S Govindaraja.

programme.title: Movie - Ninaivil Nindraval
programme.desc: A young tourist at a hill station falls in love with her tour guide. When she learns that he was wrongly implicated in a murder case, she tries to help him prove his innocence.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Anbulla Kamal
programme.desc: Roy, Soorya, Amir and Gauri, four individuals who suffer from a terminal disease, become friends. They embark on a journey to meet Soorya's girlfriend and gain a positive outlook on life.

programme.title: Movie - Mirugam
programme.desc: Ayyanar is a womanising, savage man who beats up innocents and rapes women. He marries the pretty Alagamma who at first hates him, but later decides to transform him. But, his sinful past soon catches up.

programme.title: Movie - Makkal En Pakkam
programme.desc: Childhood friends Samraj and Rajmohan become enemies after Samraj is falsely accused of theft. When Samraj becomes a smuggler, he constantly faces problems due to Rajmohan's political influence.

programme.title: Movie - Ranuva Veeran
programme.desc: Raghu returns to his village and learns that people are being terrorised by a notorious gang. His world comes crashing down when he realises that his sister is in love with the leader of the gang.

programme.title: Movie - Hero
programme.desc: Shakthi, a young man, helps Mathi, a student, exhibit her invention at an educational fair. However, when they both are falsely accused of a patent violation, he sets out to prove their innocence.

programme.title: HSBC BWF World Tour 2025 US Open (Super 300)
programme.desc: HSBC BWF World Tour is the eighth season of the BWF World Tour of badminton, a circuit of 31 tournaments that lead up to the World Tour Finals tournament. The tour features five levels, with different levels of prize money in each of the tournaments.

programme.title: HSBC BWF World Tour 2025 US Open (Super 300): Finals

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: R2-21 (John Higgins vs Xiao Guodong)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of women’s sport.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: Women’s tennis has been a mainstay of Eastbourne since 1974’s inaugural Eastbourne Open. The tournament is played on outdoor grass courts, and is generally considered a "warm-up" for the Wimbledon Championships. Some of the world's finest female tennis talent will head to Devonshire Park to compete for the prize purse of USD$142,000. Martina Navratilova holds the record for the most singles titles with 11

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: Catch all the twists and thrills from the world's best riders from the 2025 Santos Tour Down Under.

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: Hologic WTA All Access 2025

programme.title: HSBC BWF World Tour 2025 US Open (Super 300): Finals

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Volta a Catalunya is a road bicycle race held annually in Catalonia, Spain. It is one of three World Tour stage races in Spain, together with the Vuelta a España and the Tour of the Basque Country. Raced over seven days, it covers the autonomous community of Catalonia in Northeast Spain and contains one or more stages in the mountain region of the Pyrenees. First held in 1911, the Volta a Catalunya is the fourth-oldest still-existing cycling stage race in the world.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group F: Netherlands vs Germany
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Okinoumi, Hoshoryu and Onosho.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Dozens of contestants converge in the Big D to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles the Tilting Table and Ring Toss!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Okinoumi, Hoshoryu and Onosho.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Is Glitch stealing tulips from the Netherlands? That's what the Go Jetters think!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 67
programme.desc: The Teletubbies enjoy doing 'Round and Round the Garden', especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and say "Hello".

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Dog and Pug go an adventure underground where they meet Granny Pug. They slide down a tunnel to the centre of the earth. When they arrive, they find some very friendly dinosaurs.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Messy monster is having breakfast and sees little objects on the fridge. Why don't they fall off? He goes to OKIDO to find out!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: The Kazoops are going shopping after Stan shrinks everyone's clothes in the wash, but when Monty is told Jimmy Jones won't be getting any new clothes, he begins to question why animals don't wear clothes just like humans do.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 15
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran visit the wetland centre to go pond dipping with Cynthia. JoJo wants to see a dragonfly. She spots many pond creatures like diving beetles and mayfly nymphs.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 14
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran run into Jared and Cynthia who are playing basketball. JoJo joins in, but she doesn't feel like she is tall enough to play it well.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 27
programme.desc: Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 13
programme.desc: Shane is having too much fun to stop and refuel. That is, until he runs out of coal and is stranded in the hot, red desert.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: Evil Pea lures Supertato and Tomato into her cave of frosted doom. Can they find the courage to avoid her traps and retrieve The Lost Candle of Birthdays for Tomato's Museum?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 28
programme.desc: Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 30
programme.desc: The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S4) - EP 2
programme.desc: Vinnie's tarts are made of puff pastry with a cream cheese and asparagus topping. Yum!

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Sierra Nevada in California, searching for a mother grizzly bear and her cubs.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 1
programme.desc: In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself, with Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: A beam of light sweeps through the window. Krash finds a glowing ball bouncing in the shop

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 29
programme.desc: When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain; when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 116
programme.desc: It's Teletubby Circus time! Tinky Winky balances on the tight rope, Dipsy juggles, Laa-Laa flies on the trapeze and Po is a funny clown.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 22
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'v', and they go on an adventure around the sound. We see a van and a volcano, and meet a violet violin!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Lofty's giant sneezes go a long way, so Messy and his friends must help to wash OKIDO clean of all the bad germs flying around!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.desc: The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.desc: When a waved albatross snatches Mr Hammond's pocket bird guide book from Jen, it's up to Andy to find it and bring it home.

programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: When a waved albatross snatches Mr Hammond's pocket bird guide book from Jen, it's up to Andy to find it and bring it home.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Charli loses her phone at the toy shop. Can Tinks' super-fetch skills help her find it?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals: this time it's the tamarin and crowned pigeon. Their wild connection is that they both have fancy "hairdos".

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 12
programme.desc: Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.desc: The Squirrels think about life's big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 11
programme.desc: Sonny returns to Sodor to try to be a really useful engine again but some of the other trains aren't willing to give him a second chance.

programme.desc: Duck keeps oversleeping, so Sarah decides he needs his own alarm clock.

programme.desc: Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones is too scared of monsters to go under the bed to fetch a ball, Monty tells him that there's nothing to worry about and wonders, even if monsters really did live under the bed, how they could be sure they would even be scary.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: On a cold winter morning JoJo and Gran Gran are bird spotting. We also learn about bird migrations.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 22

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.desc: The Squirrels go out for a walk but can't find a way back to the clubhouse.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: The founding fathers of the biggest retail stores in the world battle to be the first to innovate, build, and revolutionise the industry. And Sam Walton will construct the world's largest retail empire.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of...molasses? A dancing plague that kills 100 people? A surgery with a 300% mortality rate? We search the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: Throughout history humans have buried their dead; in caves or chambers, in pyramids or in some form of a tomb - but why? Ancient tombs were visual memorials for the dead.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10) - EP 18
programme.desc: As the garden shaft operation gets deeper, the evidence of gold gets stronger.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series - EP 6
programme.desc: Shocking first-hand accounts of people who were manipulated, abused, and finally broke free before it was too late. We'll hear from former members of Gwen Shamblin's Remnant Fellowship, and more.

programme.title: American Justice - EP 22
programme.desc: When an Army Sergeant is gunned down on New Year's Eve, investigators are at a loss on who would harm the beloved family man, until fellow soldiers in his unit confess shocking secrets to solve his murder.

programme.desc: A car chase transpires to rescue a hostage being held at gunpoint. After being shocked by 14,000 volts of electricity, a man's chance of survival is in the hands of his friend.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson - EP 2
programme.desc: After years of torment, Nicole files for divorce, embarking on a new chapter that includes a risky affair with one of OJ's close friends. But a failed reconciliation led Nicole to a final, fatal stand.

programme.desc: When renowned snake-breeder Ben Renick is found dead in his snake facility, law enforcement assumes he is a victim of one of his deadly snakes.

programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles-wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.desc: After a mother is viciously murdered by her foster daughter, interrogators ask the victim's husband if he was in on the plot.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A naked man allegedly steals an ATV; a man who apparently was feeding the alligators gets a visit from police; and more.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16) - EP 22

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes - EP 6
programme.desc: Five Willow Fish is a Taiwanese dish that makes great use of the nation's affluent fishery. Chef Long interprets this dish with masterful skills, and Jason creates a dish inspired by Five Willow Fish.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics - EP 4
programme.desc: Sound the fire alarm! These chefs have a penchant for peppers so they're twisting classic foods and cranking the heat up. Grab a glass of milk because these twisted dishes will set your taste buds on fire.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork - EP 6
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants that thrive on recipes handed down through generations. First, he heads to Mamoun's Falafel, then off to Nashville to visit Silver Sands Cafe.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork - EP 9

programme.title: Best In Chow - EP 13

programme.title: Best In Chow - EP 15

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. programme.title: Africa Live

programme.title: Faces of Africa

programme.desc: Kishibe Midori (Ikeda Elaiza), an editor for a popular fashion magazine, finds herself transferring to the lexicography division following the magazine’s discontinuation. The place is filled with a group of quirky characters, led by Majime Mitsuya (Noda Yojiro), a boss with a shaggy hair who is extremely serious. Night Drama Serial "Aozora Beer" Eps. 10
programme.desc: Yukio Morikawa (Kubozuka Airu), a free-spirited outdoorsy college senior, lives by the motto: "Life's richness is measured by how many ice-cold beers you drink under the open sky." He ropes in his friend Takuma (Fujioka Maito), who's struggling with job hunting, and Ichirota (Minamide Ryoka), his junior at his part-time job, for a wild adventure: paddling a condom-maker's rubber boat from a river to the sea. After completing the journey, the trio becomes hooked on camping.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 225

programme.title: Xu Fu Treasure
programme.desc: The film is based on Xu Fu's journey to the East, a tale recorded in both history and folklore. It follows an explorer in the Republic of China who searches for Xu Fu's legendary treasure on Penglai Island while battling Japanese agents to protect China's treasure. The Japanese agent Yoshioka, who seizes Chinese treasure to further the invasion, exemplifies the invaders' evil deeds.

programme.title: Roadside Food 2 - EP 3

programme.title: An Ancient Love Song - EP 4
programme.desc: Through multiple time travels, modern-day bestselling historical author Shen Bu Yan (Guo Jia Nan) discovers Lu Yuan's (Zhang Ya Qin) deep patriotism and learns why she was misunderstood as the 'Demon Empress'. Determined, he sets out to clear her name.

programme.title: Best Choice Ever - EP 32
programme.desc: Mai Cheng Huan, a post-95 girl from an ordinary Shanghainese family proposes to her boyfriend, Xin Jia Liang, due to her mother's urging. The well-to-do Xin family topples the balance of this relationship. Watch how Cheng Huan embarks on her own growth path.

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 8
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: To Grow With Love - EP 1
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 17
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 18
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 22
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 6
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 25
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 16
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 1
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 10
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 6
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 25
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 16
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 1
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 10
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: The Stew of Life - EP 1
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 17
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 2
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Diary
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Winnie starts to regularly write a diary and indulges in her own imagination. She meets Ray who looks exactly like her ex-boyfriend one day and they quickly fall in love, but the relationship soon fades away. Is Ray no longer in love with Winnie or is it just her imagining that he wants a break up?

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to stay with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil begins to unfold!

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: An advertising executive, Kin, launches a martial arts tournament as an advertising campaign for his client. He travels to Japan to invite Shaolin descendant, Anna, to join the tournament. This results in attracting the eccentric masters of other eight sects to join too. As the tournament approaches, Kin and Anna unconsciously fall for each other...

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of "Infernal Affairs" are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra's blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father's old rival.

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master's rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao's betrayal...

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father's death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the "Toad Stance" and accidentally unveils his true identity...

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus' Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancee suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancee accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men's help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Let's Debate
programme.desc: The new reality debate show "Let's Debate" is hosted by Tao Ching-Ying and Chen Zi-Jian, who respectively serve as the host and chief judge. Kimberley Chen and Huang Hao-Ping lead teams as captains. The program invites numerous celebrities and internet personalities as guests, dividing them into two teams for debate competitions. Through the format of debate, the show aims to stimulate everyone's focus on critical thinking, expression, and listening skills, while exploring diverse issues.

programme.title: Let's Debate
programme.desc: The new reality debate show "Let's Debate" is hosted by Tao Ching-Ying and Chen Zi-Jian, who respectively serve as the host and chief judge. Kimberley Chen and Huang Hao-Ping lead teams as captains. The program invites numerous celebrities and internet personalities as guests, dividing them into two teams for debate competitions. Through the format of debate, the show aims to stimulate everyone's focus on critical thinking, expression, and listening skills, while exploring diverse issues.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Let's Debate
programme.desc: The new reality debate show "Let's Debate" is hosted by Tao Ching-Ying and Chen Zi-Jian, who respectively serve as the host and chief judge. Kimberley Chen and Huang Hao-Ping lead teams as captains. The program invites numerous celebrities and internet personalities as guests, dividing them into two teams for debate competitions. Through the format of debate, the show aims to stimulate everyone's focus on critical thinking, expression, and listening skills, while exploring diverse issues.

programme.title: Let's Debate
programme.desc: The new reality debate show "Let's Debate" is hosted by Tao Ching-Ying and Chen Zi-Jian, who respectively serve as the host and chief judge. Kimberley Chen and Huang Hao-Ping lead teams as captains. The program invites numerous celebrities and internet personalities as guests, dividing them into two teams for debate competitions. Through the format of debate, the show aims to stimulate everyone's focus on critical thinking, expression, and listening skills, while exploring diverse issues.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Super Taste: 48 Hour Burning Desire!
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Focus World News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Super Taste: 48 Hour Burning Desire!

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 9
programme.desc: The 7 individuals were all involved in the heated case of a missing girl. As they attempt to escape their fate and pursue the truth, they find themselves embroiled in secrets, lies, and desires in this retribution tale.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 6
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 37
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1982
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 654
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Your Finesse - EP 4
programme.desc: Constable Fei Ren (Kalok Chow), his companion Gao Qiang (Joey Wong), and guide Murong Gongzi (Brian Chu) uncover hidden conspiracies in the mysterious Yi Jiang Palace while pursuing a spy and exposing the true mastermind behind the city's facade.

programme.title: Kill My Sins - EP 20

programme.title: An Ancient Love Song - EP 4
